EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Confirm - Singapore
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Singapore. Please find the event details below:
Date: Thursday, November 6, 2014 Time: 1.30pm for registration, Seminar 2pm-3.00pm, Seminar & Workshop 2pm - 6pm Location: IDA Lab @ National Design Center #03-04 | 111 Middle Road, Singapore
{{my.Save The Date - Singapore:default=edit me}}
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
